text: Nostradamus decoded Nostradamus was
always something of an outsider just
before he was born the church cast its
long shadow over his Jewish family in
1496 a new edict forced them to convert
to Christianity or be expelled from
France or worse instead michel de
nostradame s was the first child in the
family to be baptized in the Catholic
faith one of the things that we have
through popular culture believed with
Nostradamus is that he just spent his
whole life up in some room somewhere
making prophecies but Nostradamus was a
Renaissance man the true sense of the
word
he was an apothecary he was a physician
it was a time when the human intellect
began to look for rational not religious
explanation for the mysteries of the
universe Nostradamus was a maverick as a
medical student at the University of
Montpellier pushing the boundaries of
accepted scientific practice he was
expelled because there were complaints
about him as a druggist he was working
on certain types of medicine on his own
which was something that he was not
supposed to do as a doctor Nostradamus
was not a man willing to sit on the
sidelines when the plague devastated
France he became famous for braving the
ravaged villages that other doctors left
for dead
the plague was a shadow that followed
him all through his life it was also a
challenge even as he battled the hellish
conditions there was worse in store for
him he had a great tragedy in his life
where the famous plague doctor could not
save his wife and his two young children
and for six years he drops out of the
history
why did Nostradamus become a prophet I
think it was probably as a result of the
trauma he suffered with the loss of his
first wife and his children and he then
went on a long pilgrimage through Italy
Spain he walked all over the place saw
many things I think during that period
he changed Nostradamus lived in a world
that was falling apart the plague of
bloody civil war religious schisms and
foreign invaders made the future look
very dark as the world changed around
him
Nostradamus turned inward and created
the poetry of prediction the legendary
quatrains
